Body:
"""
    Test that data of various lengths can be unpadded correctly using
    different padding schemes.
    """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
result = engine._handle_symmetric_padding(symmetric_padding_parameters.get(
    'algorithm'), symmetric_padding_parameters.get('padded_text'),
    symmetric_padding_parameters.get('padding_method'), undo_padding=True)
assert result == symmetric_padding_parameters.get('plain_text')
